eventDescriptions.description: Asset metadata or security is updated. This can happen via the web ui, bulk tools, api etc.
Asset rendition is updated. This can happen via replace preview feature, operations reprocessing request, etc.
Asset is soft deleted via the web ui or the api.
Asset is permanently deleted via the web ui.
A file versioning occurred for a given asset via web ui or interface tools.
A custom action execution is initiated by the end user most likely, but also possible via api.
A bulk edit is initiated via the web ui or the api
An asset that previously was metadata only, has a file attached.
